text: @racheljulie @NYGovCuomo I’m am devastated over the depth of failure from this useless WH.I am SO SORRY. Wish I can do something..the only I can do is stay home.But really wish I can do more. My brother-in-law is an ICU pulmonary dr&he’s been living apart.We worry about this catastrophe #COVID19 #PPENow
